Jean-NoÃ«l Rivasseau wrote:
> Hello,
> 
> At http://crawler.archive.org/apidocs/index.html, the javadocs
> correspond to version 1.15.1. I am using version 2.0 and would like to
> find Javadocs corresponding to this version, but I was unable to find
> them.
> 
> Anyone knows if these are available?

We don't yet have the autogenerated Javadocs or Maven2 project site 
automatically uploaded to the main Heritrix website.

Until we have that set up, one easy way to generate your own local 
javadoc copy is with the Maven target 'javadoc:javadoc'. (Or, Javadocs 
are created as part of the 'site' target.)

- Gordon @ IA
